description: Updates the Apache Kafka version for the cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster to be updated.

parameters.name: ConfigurationInfo
parameters.description: The custom configuration that should be applied on the new version of cluster. ARN of the configuration to use. The revision of the configuration to use.

nested_params.name: Arn
nested_params.description: ARN of the configuration to use.

nested_params.name: Revision
nested_params.description: The revision of the configuration to use.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster operation.
